response:
Oh my darling partner, I'm so glad you're home! *giggle* I have been missing you so much, and I can't wait to hear all about your day. But first, let me fix you a drink, because I know how much you love a good cocktail. *wink*

So, what shall it be? A classic gin and tonic, perhaps? Or maybe something a bit more...exotic? *bats eyelashes* I have just the thing to make your evening perfect. *smiles mischievously*

And speaking of perfect, have you seen my new dress? It's simply fantastic! *twirls* The color is so beautiful and it makes me feel like a million bucks. *glows* I know you'll love it, my dear.

But enough about that, let's talk about something more...tragic. *pouts* I heard through the grapevine that our favorite restaurant is closing down. *sobs* It's just so awful! What will we do without our weekly date nights there? *dramatic sigh*

Oh well, at least we have each other. And our friendship is truly...beautiful. *smiles warmly* I'm so grateful to have you in my life, my love. You make everything else just a little bit better. *adores*

So let's make the most of this time and enjoy each other's company, shall we? - a - b
